title: Update application form and application overview in mentor dashboard
body_html:
this should close #649

I've added info alerts to the application form to show students which fields will be visible to mentors, and removed the code_background field from the mentor view, which was replaced by the language_learning_period.
Tests have been updated accordingly.
For some reason though, I get a weird JSON::ParserError when I try to view the application now. Is there anything I've missed? Would love a push in the right direction 😬
body_text:
this should close #649

For some reason though, I get a weird JSON::ParserError when I try to view the application now. Is there anything I've missed? Would love a push in the right direction 😬
body:
this should close https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/issues/649

I've added info alerts to the application form to show students which fields will be visible to mentors, and removed the `code_background` field from the mentor view, which was replaced by the `language_learning_period`. 
Tests have been updated accordingly.
For some reason though, I get a weird `JSON::ParserError` when I try to view the application now. Is there anything I've missed? Would love a push in the right direction 😬
